  • Reference

Intergenerational transmission of poverty data

Source: R/data.R
pov_trans.Rd

Data from the ECV for the years 2005, 2011, and 2019.

pov_trans

Format

A tibble (see tibble::tibble-package) with columns:

id_p

Person identifier.

ecv_year

The year the survey was conducted. Data refer to the previous year.

age

Age, in years.

mabsent

fabsent

adults

children

siblings

nworking

fcountry

fnation

mcountry

mnation

feduc

meduc

fworker

fself

funempl

finactive

foccup

mworker

mself

munempl

minactive

moccup

well_being

fin_hardship

Source

Microdata at INE, the Spanish Statistical Office
